main event: A witness observed a bright, glowing spherical object over Uniontown, Ohio on August 25, 1960.
interesting points: The object was about 40-50 feet in diameter, metallic in color, and appeared to be stationary at an altitude of 2,000-3,000 feet.
The witness observed the object for about 5 minutes before it suddenly disappeared.
No sound was heard during the sighting.
The witness was thoroughly questioned and appears to be a reliable person.
There were no other known witnesses to this sighting.
